actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Depository Institutions Deregulation Committee should establish a housing differential for thrift institutions of one-Quarter of one percent on all categories of deposits and accounts, other than negotiable order-of-withdrawal accounts, which were established after December 10, 1975.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Depository Institutions Deregulation Committee should establish a specified housing differential for thrift institutions through April 1, 1986.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Depository Institutions Deregulation Committee should establish a housing differential for thrift institutions of one-Quarter of one percent on all categories of deposits and accounts, other than negotiable order-of-withdrawal accounts, which were established after December 10, 1975.
